message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,500 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product.
